thread.title: Marrakesh Marathon 2025

author: carnifest.com
title: Marrakesh Marathon 2025
text:
Marrakesh Marathon The Marrakesh Marathon is an annual race held in Marrakesh, Morocco, typically in January.
Known for its scenic route, it takes participants through the city’s vibrant streets, historic landmarks, and palm-lined avenues, offering a unique blend of culture and athleticism.
event attracts runners from all over the world, offering both full marathon and shorter race options. The race is celebrated for its warm climate, festive atmosphere, and the stunning backdrop of the Atlas Mountains.
Marathon registration, the route and detailed schedules are on the race website via the link shown below under the heading: “Event Related Information”.
